wikipedia_page.main: Sir Ernest Varvill Hiley (1868–1949) was Conservative MP for Birmingham DuddestonOriginally a solicitor, he was town clerk of Leicester and Birmingham.  He was knighted in 1917.He was elected as an MP in 1922 but stood down in 1923, an unusually short term.He later served on two Royal Commissions.
